definition: and so on/in a similar fashion
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: Each impact three others and three others.
sentences.chinese: 每个再影响三个，以此类推。

sentences.english: When is again same, before attains the second many row, ex analogia.
sentences.chinese: 再相同时，以获第二名较多者列前，以此类推。

sentences.english: The analogies to our most recent foreign policy debates are obvious and telling.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，我们最近的外交政策辩论也是如此。

sentences.english: The insolence and brutality of anger, in the same manner, when we indulge its fury without check or restraint, is, of all objects, the most detestable.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，无所顾忌傲慢粗鲁的愤怒是最令人憎恶的。

sentences.english: In this context, history could repeat itself in the Arab World.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，阿拉伯世界有可能重蹈覆辙。

sentences.english: The word of higher component is same analogize.
sentences.chinese: 更高分的话一样以此类推。

sentences.english: The Copperhead will flash 3 times if switched to Profile 3 and so on.
sentences.chinese: 如果切换到3号配置，会闪烁3下，以此类推。

sentences.english: On the third, four grains of rice and so on and so on.
sentences.chinese: 第三个方格四粒大米，以此类推。

sentences.english: By that analogy, we ought to regulate it.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，我们应当控制它的使用。

sentences.english: I could go on all day, but you get the point.
sentences.chinese: 以此类推，我可以这样说一天，但你知道我的意思了。

sentences.english: And so on, for each of the seven fields.
sentences.chinese: 七个字段中的每一个都以此类推。

definition: to increase by degrees/in increasing order/incremental/progressive
Tongli, a city in Jiangsu Province, China
positive odd number (also written 奇數|奇数)/singular (grammar)
